home_hero_subtitle: A platform that empowers artisans by connecting their craft to a global audience through the power of stories and AI.
story_assistant_desc: Don't just sell a product, sell a story. Our AI assistant helps you record and refine the cultural narrative behind your craft, connecting with customers on a deeper level.
insights_explorer_desc: Journey through the rich history and cultural significance of artisanal crafts. Our AI-powered explorer provides deep insights into the traditions that shape every masterpiece.
